text: Krasny Yar () is a rural locality (a village) in Polozovoskoye Rural Settlement, Bolshesosnovsky District, Perm Krai, Russia. The population was 352 as of 2010. There are 7 streets. == Geography == It is located 4 km north- east from Polozovo. == References == Category:Rural localities in Bolshesosnovsky District
title: Krasny Yar, Bolshesosnovsky District, Perm Krai
